mapper.select: SELECT p.user_no AS userNo ,p.podcast_title AS podCastTitle ,p.podcast_subtitle AS podCastSubTitle ,c.category_main AS categoryMain ,(CASE WHEN IFNULL(p.category_no2, '-') = '-' THEN null ELSE c1.category_main END ) AS categoryMain2 FROM podcast p INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_no1 = c.category_no LEFT OUTER JOIN category c1 ON p.category_no2 = c1.category_no WHERE p.podcast_no = #{podCast.podCastNo}

SELECT p.podcast_no AS podCastNo , p.user_no AS userNo , p.category_no1 AS categoryNo1 , p.category_no2 AS categoryNo2 , p.podcast_title AS podCastTitle , p.podcast_subtitle AS podCastSubTitle , p.podcast_publicbroadcast AS podCastPublicBroadCast , u.user_nickname AS userNickname FROM podcast AS p INNER JOIN user AS u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY podcast_no DESC
